channel.title: Helm on The Road
channel.description: Recent content in Helm on The Road

item.title: Deploy Sonatype Nexus repository OSS on EKS
item.description: Sonatype Nexus repository OSS is an artifact repository that supports most software repositories such as Maven, Pypi, Npmjs, Rubygems, Yum, Apt, Docker registry and etc. In the enterprise Nexus repository is widely used for storing proprietary artifacts and caching the artifacts for speeding up the devops.
